title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then add minced garlic for 30 seconds.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Add egg mixture, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok.
Add chicken and cook until lightly browned.
Add garlic and vegetables, stir-frying for 3–4 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and oyster sauce, stir well.
Cook for 2 more minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
